text: Abraham ben Judah Eberlen () was a sixteenth-century Jewish-German mathematician living in Frankfurt am Main. He was the author of Sefer ha- Ẓifar, a work containing mathematical problems with solutions, which was finished in February 1537. ==References== * Category:16th-century German mathematicians Category:16th-century German writers Category:16th-century Jews Category:16th-century male writers Category:German Jews Category:Hebrew- language writers Category:Scientists from Frankfurt
title: Abraham Eberlen
